channel.title: Compiler Problem Please Reply Asap
channel.description:
How Do I Fix This Compiler Error ?
client.java:28: ';' expected public boolean protectMelee() ^ client.java:32: illegal start of type else ^ client.java:32: ';' expected else ^ client.java:33: illegal start of type return true; ^ client.java:33: <identifier> expected return true; ^ client.java:33: ';' expected return true; ^ 6 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compiler Problem Please Reply Asap
item.dc:creator: @compile_easy compile easy
item.description:

usage:javac
use -help for a list of possable options

item.title: Compiler Problem Please Reply Asap
item.dc:creator: @arrow9191 arrow9191
item.description:
@arrow9191 wrote:

Please try reading the error before you post it… It says “;” expected so just do what the error says and add the ; at the end of every line that it says is missing it.
